title: Assembly Part Relationship
description: The aspect provides the child parts (one structural level down) which the given object assembles.

parent_uuid.title: Parent UUID
parent_uuid.description: The Catena-X ID of the parent object, into which the given child object is assembled in.

parent_part_instance_id.title: Parent Part Instance ID
parent_part_instance_id.description: The Parent Part Instance ID of the parent object Part Instance ID, to identify parent object in digital twins.

parent_manufacturer_part_id.title: Parent Manufacturer Part ID
parent_manufacturer_part_id.description: The Parent Manufacturer Part ID of the parent object Manufacturer Part ID, to identify parent object in digital twins.

parent_optional_identifier_key.title: Parent Optional Identifier Key
parent_optional_identifier_key.description: The Parent Optional Identifier Key of the parent object Optional Identifier Key, to identify parent object in digital twins.

parent_optional_identifier_value.title: Parent Optional Identifier Value
parent_optional_identifier_value.description: The Parent Optional Identifier Value of the parent object Optional Identifier Value, to identify parent object in digital twins.

uuid.title: UUID URN
uuid.description: The Catena-X ID of the child object which is assembled into the given parent part. The provided regular expression ensures that the UUID is composed of five groups of characters separated by hyphens, in the form 8-4-4-4-12 for a total of 36 characters (32 hexadecimal characters and 4 hyphens), optionally prefixed by 'urn:uuid:' to make it an IRI.

part_instance_id.title: Part Instance ID
part_instance_id.description: The serial number of the serialized part from the manufacturer. We assume here that the customer does not have or create its own serial number for a part, but just used the manufacturer's serial number.

manufacturer_part_id.title: Manufacturer Part ID
manufacturer_part_id.description: The ID of the type/catalog part (of which the serialized part is an instance of) from the manufacturer.

optional_identifier_key.title: Optional Identifier Key
optional_identifier_key.description: The Optional Identifier Key is used for create optional identifier for shell in digital twins. If you ha Identifier Key provided.

optional_identifier_value.title: Optional Identifier Value
optional_identifier_value.description: The Optional Identifier Value is used for create optional identifier for shell in digital twins. If you ha Identifier Key provided.

lifecycle_context.title: Lifecycle Context
lifecycle_context.description: The lifecycle context in which the child part was assembled into the parent part.

quantity_number.title: Quantity Number
quantity_number.description: The number of objects related to the measurement unit

measurement_unit.title: Measurement Unit
measurement_unit.description: Unit of Measurement for the quantity of serialized objects

created_on.title: Created On
created_on.description: Timestamp when the relation between the parent part and the child part was created, e.g. when the serialized child part was assembled into the given part.

last_modified_on.title: last Modified On
last_modified_on.description: Timestamp when the assembly relationship between parent part and child part was last modified.
